item.description:
Valentine's Day got you down?

Come to Real Art Ways in Hartford for a saucy evening where Jamie Cat Callan, author of "Hooking Up or Holding Out," will dispense her quirky and quite often unexpected relationship advice (along with champagne and chocolate). Get hot tips on flirting and find out how you can get the adoration and attention you deserve! Get answers to your burning love questions, so take notes and walk out a vixen/stud!

FREE!

Real Art Ways
56 Arbor St.
Hartford, CT

6 pm...get there early, I'm sure it will be well attended!

Plenty of FREE parking.

Linda Karen is your organizer. She says "Look for me...I'll be wearing a RED HAT."

Directions:
From either I 84 W or E---take exit 46 (Sisson Ave). At the end of the long exit ramp, turn LEFT at the lite onto Sisson Ave. Very quickly you come to another lite (Capitol Ave)---turn LEFT. Your THIRD RIGHT is Arbor St. Turn RIGHT onto Arbor St. You'll see a large sign (RAW) on your LEFT. Turn into the driveway AT THE SIGN and proceed all the way to the back of the building. Enter at the back of the building.

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Free Event - 'Twas The Night Before Valentine's
